name: Memoir (itch)
description:
Memoir is a game where you explore a mythical ancient castle and solve puzzles, filled with myths and lost stories while unfolding the secrets to a civilization of deer horned people.

Reveal the mysteries of a mythical ancient castle as you solve puzzle along the way. Guide a little deer kin as she wakes up at the entrance of a mythical ancient castle without memories.

  • 6 different themed areas for players to explore and discover the story.
  • Grid based puzzle where players push puzzle objects to the goals.
  • Puzzle objects can merge to become bigger or eliminate each other to fit the goals requirement.
